home.p: I am experienced, open to development, passionate and attentive in the field of Full Stack Web Developer. I am a successful team player in the projects I work on and I can manage the project alone, taking responsibility when necessary. I am currently looking for a working environment that will guide me and my projects and enable me to develop with good education.

about.p:
I am a software developer who follows my dreams.

There is a production that constantly questions, is not afraid of constantly improving itself and trying something new. I like to learn new things. I have strong communication skills.

services.name: Web Development
services.description: I offer services related to the creation and maintenance of websites, such as front-end design, back-end development.

services.name: Graphic Design
services.description: I provide services such as logo design, corporate identity creation, flyer design, catalog creation and packaging design.

services.name: Digital Marketing
services.description: I offer services such as SEO, social media management and digital marketing strategy development.
